name: Kukui 2 Demo
description: Kukui 2 is about a seventeen-year-old boy that has gone through brain trauma and split personalities when he was younger. The boy had a stepsister that was his age but he accidentally killed her 10 years ago while he was portraying another person. The split personality drove Kyle to hurt others and himself. Seven years later, the boy's split personality has not gotten any better, he has managed to fabricate many other characters. In this chapter of his life, we get to learn how Kyle meets a girl that has similar traits as his sister did, and tries to protect her from any harm that might come her way.
